com.percussion.services.sitemgr
Interface IPSSiteManagerInternal

All Superinterfaces:
IPSCataloger, IPSSiteManager
public interface IPSSiteManagerInternal
extends IPSSiteManager

This is used by internal code, not exposed to general public. Hopefully as a temporary interface. It should be removed after we implemented all the TODOs.

Method Detail

findSiteTemplatesAssociations

Map<PSPair<IPSGuid,String>,Collection<IPSGuid>> findSiteTemplatesAssociations()
Finds the Site and Templates associations. This is not exposed in IPSSiteManager because the map key is not consistent with map value, but we need the ID/Name pair in PSAssemblyBaseWs.getTemplateWs(java.util.List).

Returns:
the association map, where the map key is Site ID/Name, which maps to a collection of associated Template IDs. The collection of Template IDs is never null, but may be empty. The returned map can never be null, but may be empty.
